titles.title: Dǝrsanä Mikaʾel, Homiliary for the feasts of St. Michael

shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Dǝrsanä Mikaʾel, Homiliary for the feasts of St. Michael (fols. 1ra-108rb) I-1) Introduction and ʾarke-hymn (fols. 1ra-4vb) I-2) Homily by Timothy (Dämatewos), [Patriarch] of Alexandria [for Ḫǝdar] and ʾarke-hymn (fols. 6ra-13vb); miracle (fol. 15ra-vb); commemorative notice (fol. 16ra-va); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 16va-vb) I-3) Homily by Metropolitan Yoḥannǝs the Orthodox for the 12th of Taḫśaś [Miyazya] and ʾarke-hymn (fols. 17ra-21vb); miracle (fols. 22va-23b); commemorative notice (fols. 23va-24rb); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 24rb) I-4) Homily by an anonymous author for the 12th of Ṭǝrr [Taḫśaś] and ʾarke-hymn (fols. 25ra-30rb); miracle (fol. 31ra-rb); commemorative notice (fol. 32ra-rb); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 32rb) I-5) Homily by an anonymous author for the 12th of Yäkkatit and ʾarke-hymn (fols. 33ra-36ra); miracle (fols. 36va-37rb); commemorative notice (fol. 38ra-rb); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 38rb) I-6) Homily by Yoḥannǝs [Severus], Metropolitan [Patriarch] of Antiochia for the 12th of Mäggabit and ʾarke-hymn (fols. 39ra-51vb); miracle (fols. 52va-53rb); commemorative notice (fol. 54ra); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 54ra-rb) I-7) Homily [by Epiphanius, Metropolitan of Cyprus] for the 12th of Miyazya [Ṭǝrr] and ʾarke-hymn (fols. 55ra-57vb, 59ra-61rb); miracle (fols. 58ra-rb, 62ra-vb); commemorative notice (fol. 63ra-rb); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 63rb) I-8) Homily by Yoḥannǝs, Metropolitan of Ethiopia for Gǝnbot and ʾarke-hymn (fols. 64ra-65rb); miracle (fols. 66ra-67rb); commemorative notice (fol. 68ra-rb); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 68rb) I-9) Homily by Yoḥannǝs, Metropolitan of Aksum (ʾAkwǝsǝm) [for Säne] and ʾarke-hymn (fols. 69ra-74rb); miracle (fol. 75ra-vb); commemorative notice (fols. 76va-77rb); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 77rb) I-10) Homily by Metropolitan Yoḥannǝs for Ḥamle and ʾarke-hymn (fols. 78ra-82rb); miracle (fol. 83ra-vb); commemorative notice (fol. 84va-vb); ʾarke-hymn (fols. 84vb-85ra) I-11) Homily by an anonymous author for Näḥase and ʾarke-hymn (fols. 86ra-89rb); miracle (fol. 90ra-vb); commemorative notice (fol. 92ra-rb); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 92rb) I-12) Homily by an anonymous author for Mäskäräm and ʾarke-hymn (fols. 93ra-95vb); miracle (fols. 96vb-97rb); commemorative notice (fol. 97va); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 97va-vb) I-13) Homily by an anonymous author for Ṭǝqǝmt and ʾarke-hymn (fols. 98va-101vb, 105ra-106rb); miracle (fol. 106va-vb); commemorative notice (fols. 107va-108rb); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 108rb)
Additiones 1-3.

donors.donor: The name of the original donor was erased and replaced with those of Wäldä Kiros and Wälättä Yoḥannǝs (e.g., fols. 69ra, 73vb, 75ra, 77ra, 105va), which in turn have been erased and replaced with those of Wäldä Maryam and Wälättä Mädḫǝn, in brown ink. Sometimes other names, such as Gäbrä ʾƎgziʾabǝḥer (fols. 24ra, 33ra), are added into the supplication formulas (see also Additiones 1 and 2).

txstates.txstate: The front board is missing. Leather cover is torn off (only turn-ins are preserved on the inner side of the back board). The Ms. was resewn. One folio (after fol. 15) is missing. Some folios are detached from their counterparts and misplaced (leaves of quire B). A thread is stitched through fols. 102-111 (close to the tail). Fol. 104 is cut in half. Holes or tears amended on fols. 13, 64. Some fols. are affected by water (at the end of the codex).

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards (front board is missing) covered with reddish-brown leather (for the most part missing); textile inlay.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown turn-ins (1 tool was used: single line fillet).

bnothers.bnother: Small holes or tears are visible on the spine fold of the quires, close to the head and the tail of the codex.

squires.squire:
I፩(8/fols. 1r-8v) – II[፪](7/fols. 9r-15v) – III፫(8/fols. 16r-23v) – IV፬(8/fols. 24r-31v) – V፭ (8/fols. 32r-39v) – VI፮(8/fols. 40r-47v) – VII፯(8/fols. 48r-55v) – VIII፰(8/fols. 56r-63v) – IX[፱](28/fols. 64r-71v) – X፲(6/fols. 72r-77v) – XI፲፩(8/fols. 78r-85v) – XII፲፪(8/fols. 86r-93v) – XIII፲፫(8/fols. 94r-101v) – B(3/fols. 102r-104v) – XIV፲፬(6/fols. 105r-108v) – B(3/fols. 109r-111v).
The structure of quires II and B cannot be identified due to the poor condition of the Ms. The last leaf of quire II is missing. Fol. 58 in quire VIII is misplaced (its original position is between fols. 62 und 63).

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; name of the protagonist; groups of lines on the incipit page of each section of the text; two initial lines of each subsection; word sälam "salutation"; elements of the punctuation signs and of the text dividers; elements of Ethiopic numerals.

abbreviations.abbreviation: ለዓለመ፡ ዓ፡ አ፡ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ (fol. 105va)

otherdetails.otherdetail: Each section includes the following hymns: I-1) ኦዘመሐርከ፡ ለዕንጦንዮስ፡ ባህታዊ። ... (fol. 4va-vb) I-2) እንበለ፡ ሕማም፡ {አምላክ፡} አመ፡ ከመ፡ ዮም። ... (fol. 13vb) I-3) ኦዘአድኃንኮሙ፡ ለደቂቀ፡ ሕግ፡ ፫ቱ፡ ... (fol. 21vb) I-4) ኦዘድኃንእኮ፡ ለቴዎድሮስ፡ መዋዒ። ... (fol. 30rb) I-5) ኦዘወሀብኮ፡ እምአፈ፡ በላዒ፡ መብልዓ። ... (fols. 35vb-36ra) I-6) ኦዘተዛለፍኮ፡ ለበለዓም፡ በፍኖቱ። ... (fol. 52vb) I-7) ኦዘባላሕኮሙ፡ በወርኃ፡ ሚያዝያ፡ ወርኃ፡ ባልሖ።... (fol. 64ra) I-8) ኦዘፆርከ፡ በክሳደ፡ እክል፡ አኃዜ፡ ... (fol. 65rb) I-9) ኦዘድኃንእካ፡ እምኃጕለ፡ መብረቅ፡ ወትንታኔ። ... (fol. 75vb) I-10) ኦዘቀተለከ፡ ሰናክሬምሃ፡ ጸዓሌ። ... (fol. 82rb) I-11) ኦዘአጽናዕከ፡ ቍስጣንጢኖስሃ፡ ኃሣሤ። ... (fol. 89ra) I-12) ኦዘፈወስኮ፡ ለሕዝቅያስ፡ እምደዊሁ። ... (fol. 96rb) I-13) ኦዘኃደጎ፡ ለዘኃደገ፡ መንፈሱ። ... (fol. 105va).

additional.cont: Fol. 109va: Protective prayer against "anxiety" (Ḥǝmamä dǝngaḍe).
additional.add: Fol. 109va: ጸሎት፡ በእንተ፡ ሕማመ፡ ድንጋጼ፡ ባርከኒ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ ርድአኒ፡ ወአድኅነኒ፡ እማእምቀ፡ ምድር፡ ወተነቀፍ፡ ወውግረተ፡ እብን፡...
additional.det: The note is written in the same hand as Additiones 2 and 3. The names of Wäldä Maryam and Kidanä Maryam are written over erasure.

additional.cont: Fol. 109vb: Protective prayer against eye disease (Ḥǝmamä ˁayn).
additional.add: Fol. 109vb: ጸሎት፡ በእንተ፡ ሕማመ፡ ዐይን፡ የአሐጂም፡ ያቀሐጂም፡ ኮክሞስ፡ እልንዱስ፡ እልቅንቶስ፡ ራአት፡ ዝንቱ፡ አስማቲከ፡ አደኅኖ[sic]፡ ለገብርከ፡ ወልደ፡ ማርያም፡ ...
additional.det: The note is written in the same hand as Additiones 1 and 3. The name of Wäldä Maryam is written over erasure.

additional.cont: Fol. 110ra: Protective prayer against the evil eye (Ḥǝmamä ˁaynät).
additional.det: The note is written in Gǝʿǝz and Amharic, in the same hand as Additiones 2 and 3. The names of Wäldä Maryam and Gäbrä ʾƎgziʾabǝḥer are written over erasure.

extras.extra: - Passages are written in a small script: fols. 31rb, 38rb. - Corrections are written over erasures, in the main and in a secondary hand: e.g., fols. 4rb, 22vb, 47ra, 50ra, 50va, 57rb (several lines), 63rb, 72vb, 93rb. - Erasures are marked with thin lines: e.g., fols. 20va, 27va, 94vb, 101ra. - Scribbles: fols. 5v, 7r, 18r, 26r, 30v, 46v, 47r, 50va, 98b, 102r-104v, 110rb-111v.

txquiremarks.txquiremark: - Simply decorated quire marks are written in the right lower corner, on the last fol. of the quire: fols. 8v: ፩, [15v: ፪], 23v: ፫, 31v: ፬, 39v: ፭, 47v: ፮, 55v: ፯, 63v: ፰, 71v: ፱ (erased), 77v: ፲, 85v: ፲፩, 93v: ፲፪, 101v: ፲፫, 108v: ፲፬.
